name: General Pest Control
description: Comprehensive treatment for cockroaches, ants, and spiders.
details: Our General Pest Control service provides a thorough inspection and treatment of your home to eliminate common pests like ants, cockroaches, and silverfish. We use safe, eco-friendly chemicals that are effective against pests but harmless to humans and pets. Service includes a 30-day warranty.

name: Termite Control
description: Protect your furniture from destructive termites with our specialized treatment.
details: Termite infestation can cause serious structural damage. Our anti-termite treatment creates a chemical barrier around your property to prevent termite entry. We offer both pre-construction and post-construction treatments with a multi-year warranty for complete peace of mind.

name: Rodent Control
description: Safe and effective solutions to eliminate rats and mice from your premises.
details: Our rodent control service is designed to effectively eliminate rats and mice. We use a combination of baiting, trapping, and exclusion techniques to manage the infestation. Our methods are safe for children and pets, ensuring your home remains a healthy environment.

name: Rodent Control
